name: Candy mountains
description:
Higly addictive Candy mountains is here to stay!

This is a truly amazing game that will take you on the sugar candy mountains adventure.
Tap to keep the sugarball hopping and bouncing, avoid any kind of danger like spikes, traps and evil bombs.

Nothing is what you might expect, the pattern will not be the same and the game will change just as fast aswell.

Cute adventure candy story for all ages to play, young and elder loves the candy bounce game and this is it!
Collect coins wich can be used to unlock new awesome stuff (secret ones)
and gain powerups that will boost you up straight to the top!

No in app purchases and no ads what so ever!
